title: Got S- but did not got the chest?
body:
https://imgur.com/QSTSEhT

so i got an S- on twitch but i didnt got my box? nor any notifications regarding it. meanwhile i got s- with vayne and i got a box for it. is this a bug or something has changed? oh and please check Star Guardian Miss Fortune's recalling. your health bar goes up when she is recalling, thanks!

replies.body:
Yea that's looking a little odd on my side of things, to be honest. I can see your most recent match with twitch in match history, but it doesn't seem to have logged your mastery score for that match yet so something might be going on there. 

Reach out to our game team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to have them look a little deeper into this, and there's also still a chance the mastery score might be recorded a little late and the chest might pop up any second too!
